segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman looks while standing in a puddle of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy stretching to reach the cookie jar, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl is eagerly waiting for a cookie, completely ignoring the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should turn around and see what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like the scene is about to turn into a disaster any moment now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water continuing to overflow, and it's making me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool is about to tip, and the boy is going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are being too reckless, and someone is going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of dread, hoping the woman will notice the water soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the garden outside, so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this scene is a perfect example of how quickly things can go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
